creator: muhammad.ahsann@gmail.com
text:
My Apache2.2.2 server hung up every day on almost same time, I am getting the following  error messages in apache error log.

[Tue Apr 08 07:09:06 2014] [error] [client 8.35.200.33] (70007)The timeout specified has expired: proxy: error reading status line from remote server mydomain.com:443
[Tue Apr 08 07:09:06 2014] [error] [client 8.35.200.33] proxy: Error reading from remote server returned by /sgpp/lite/arm/portal/subscription
[Tue Apr 08 00:09:14 2014] [error] [client 8.35.200.40] (70007)The timeout specified has expired: proxy: error reading status line from remote server mydomain.com:443
[Tue Apr 08 00:09:14 2014] [error] [client 8.35.200.40] proxy: Error reading from remote server returned by /sgpp/lite/arm/portal/subscription

I am using mod_proxy as reverse proxy which is activated by RewriteRule directive. I have tried all option mentioned in PR#37770.

Here is my apache2.cong settings:

KeepAlive off
MaxKeepAliveRequests 100
KeepAliveTimeout 15
SetEnv force-proxy-request-1.0 1
SetEnv proxy-nokeepalive 1
ProxyTimeout 300

Please help, I am facing this issue at my production server.

Thanks,
Ahsan

creator: covener@gmail.com
text:
Bugzilla is for reporting bugs in the server, not support. Nothing in the error below implies a problem with the server other than a non-responsive backend.

http://httpd.apache.org/userslist.html
